Example 2:  Rating Decision Involving SMC for Total SC Deafness in One Ear and Bilateral Blindness
Situation
:  The Veteran has
bilateral SC blindness with
no light perception (NLP) in the left eye, and
visual acuity of 5/200 (1.5/60) in the right eye
total SC hearing loss in the left ear
no separate and distinct disability evaluated as 100-percent disabling, and
no separate and distinct disability evaluated as 50-percent disabling.
Result
:  The Veteran is entitled to SMC under
38 U.S.C. 1114(m)
for the degree of bilateral blindness alone, but an additional one-half step in the level of SMC (“m½”) is warranted, based on the degree of hearing loss, under the provisions of
38 CFR 3.350(f)(2)(iv)
.
Coded Conclusion
:
The appropriate SMC paragraph code is PB-1.
The appropriate SMC coding is 20-20-21-00-0.
